meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a vise.
meanings.sent1: The viselike grip of the machine held the metal firmly in place.
meanings.sent2: Her viselike determination helped her succeed in the competition.
meanings.sent3: The viselike hug from the bear at the zoo made the children giggle.
meanings.sent4: His viselike focus on the task at hand impressed his colleagues.
meanings.sent5: The viselike jaws of the trap snapped shut with a loud clang.

meanings.definition: Having a tight grip or hold.
meanings.sent1: The viselike handshake of the coach showed his strength.
meanings.sent2: The viselike grasp of the toddler surprised his parents.
meanings.sent3: The viselike lid on the jar refused to budge no matter how hard she tried.
meanings.sent4: The viselike tension in the room was palpable as they awaited the results.
meanings.sent5: The viselike embrace of the tree roots held the rock firmly in place.

meanings.definition: In a manner similar to a vise.
meanings.sent1: She held on viselike to the railing as the ship rocked in the storm.
meanings.sent2: He clung viselike to the cliff, afraid of falling.
meanings.sent3: The child's fingers were viselike around the candy, not wanting to share.
meanings.sent4: The cold wind whipped viselike around the corners of the building.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's determination was viselike as he crossed the finish line.
